item.title: Bootstrapping your vimrc
item.description: When I first started with vim, I had trouble understanding how vim configuration worked and it was hard for me to use the plain vim. So I had to copy the .vimrc of a friend and as time moved, I kept adding over it to a point where my vim started slowing down. So, last week I spent some time on rewriting my .vimrc from scratch and I made another “light-weight” version of .
